meanings.definition: Zenaidas: a genus of birds in the family Columbidae
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper pointed out the Zenaidas in the aviary.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful Zenaidas flying in the park.

meanings.sent5: The Zenaidas cooed softly, filling the garden with tranquility.

meanings.definition: Zenaidas: a species of dove native to the Americas
meanings.sent1: We learned about the Zenaidas during our nature walk.
meanings.sent2: The Zenaidas perched on the fence, watching us curiously.
